message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while still providing a reasonable amount for Bob.
I think this is a fair split considering the initial offer was skewed in your favor. I'm willing to compromise.
Considering the previous offers and the inflation effect, I propose a more balanced split of 70/30 in favor of Alice. This aims to find a middle ground that respects both our needs.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I think this split is too skewed in your favor. I'm looking for a more balanced split.
